titles.title: A bill to require the construction of certain facilities at the Ioannis A. Lougaris Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Reno, Nevada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

bill.summary: 3/3/1988--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to design and begin construction on certain facilities at the Ioannis A. Lougaris Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Reno, Nevada.
